thread.title: Nicholas Houck
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Nicholas Houck

author: Nicholas Houck
title: Nicholas Houck
text: After getting a great price on my home warranty I have been pleased with the outcome every time I have had to use it. The most recent time was a few days ago when my garbage disposal starting leaking. Choice Home Warranty sent a plumber right away and they replaced my disposal. It could not have gone smoother. I recommend Choice Home Warranty very highly.
